title: How to Evolve Phantump Without Trading

steps.headline: Start a trade with yourself.
steps.description: When your two gaming platforms are near each other, you will be offered the option to trade Pokémon. You can start the trade with either character.

steps.headline: Trade Pokémon.
steps.description: You can trade your Phantump in one game as the other trades a Froakie. When both players accept the trade, Phantump will evolve into Trevenant automatically.

steps.headline: Trade the Pokémon back.
steps.description: The other player can trade back the Trevenant and you can send back the Froakie.

text: Start a trade with yourself. When your two gaming platforms are near each other, you will be offered the option to trade Pokémon. You can start the trade with either character. Trade Pokémon. You can trade your Phantump in one game as the other trades a Froakie. When both players accept the trade, Phantump will evolve into Trevenant automatically. Trade the Pokémon back. The other player can trade back the Trevenant and you can send back the Froakie.
